Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: tāmen zhǐ qídǎo zhēnzhǔ, bù qídǎo bié de shénlíng; tāmen bù wéibèi zhēnzhǔ de jìnlìng ér shārén, chúfēi yóuyú chángmìng; tāmen yě bù tōngjiān. Shéi fàn cǐ lèi (zuì'è), shéi zāo chéngfá
fùhuó rì yào shòu jiābèi de xíngfá, ér shòurǔ de yǒng jū qízhōng
Wéi huǐguò érqiě xìndào bìngxíngshàngōng zhě, zhēnzhǔ jiàng gōuxiāo qí zuìxíng, ér lùqǔ qí shàngōng. Zhēnzhǔ shì zhì shè de, shì zhì cí de
Huǐguò érqiě xíng shàn zhě, què yǐ zhuǎnxiàng zhēnzhǔ
Tāmen bù zuò jiǎ jiànzhèng, tāmen tīng dào è yán de shíhòu qiānxùn de zǒu kāi
Yǒurén yǐ tāmen de zhǔ de jīxiàng quàn jiè tāmen de shíhòu, tīngjiǎng zhě bìng bù zhuāng lóng zuò xiā de dǎhān
Tāmen shuō:“Wǒmen de zhǔ a! Qiú nǐ yǐ wǒmen de qī zǐ er nǚ wèi wǒmen de ānwèi, qiú nǐ yǐ wǒmen wèi jìngwèi zhě de diǎnfàn.”
Zhè děng rén néng jiānrěn, yīncǐ jiāng shòu gāojí de bàochóu, tāmen zài lèyuán lǐ, jiāng tīngjiàn zhùshòu hé zhù ān
Tāmen jiāng yǒng jū qízhōng. Lèyuán shì yōuměi de zhùchù hé jūsuǒ
Nǐ shuō:“Jiǎruò méiyǒu nǐmen de qídǎo, wǒ de zhǔ bìng bù guānqiè nǐmen, dàn nǐmen jì yǐ fǒurèn zhēnlǐ, gù nǐmen jiāngyào shòu wúfǎ jiětuō de xíngfá.”
